results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: የብርድና የበጋን ወራት ጉዞ ሊያላምዳቸው ይህንን ሠራ፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib

results.text: ያንን ከረኃብ ያበላቸውን ከፍርሃትም ያረካቸውን (ጌታ ያምልኩ)፡፡
results.translator: Muhammed Sadiq and Muhammed Sani Habib
